import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import senfioLogo from'./Senfio-White.png';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleUsernameChange=e=>{setUsername(e.target.value);};const handlePasswordChange=e=>{setPassword(e.target.value);};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const csrftoken=getCookie('csrftoken');try{const response=await axios.post('/api/login/',{username,password},{headers:{'X-CSRFToken':csrftoken}});console.log(username,password);if(response.data.success){window.location.href='/home/';}else{document.getElementById('erro').innerText='Credenciais Inválidas, Tente novamente!';}}catch(error){console.error('Erro ao fazer login:',error.response.data);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",id:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"LOGIN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:senfioLogo,id:"imagem_logo",alt:"Senfio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",name:"username",value:username,onChange:handleUsernameChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",name:"password",value:password,onChange:handlePasswordChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{id:"erro"})]})]});}export default App;// Função para obter o valor do cookie
function getCookie(name){const cookieValue=document.cookie.match('(^|;)\\s*'+name+'\\s*=\\s*([^;]+)');return cookieValue?cookieValue.pop():'';}
